```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(reshape2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
dadosCEAP <- read.csv("/home/gabrielmla/Documentos/dadosCEAP.csv")
dados.cont.usos <- dadosCEAP %>% group_by(sgPartido) %>% summarise(count = n()) %>% arrange(desc(count)) %>% na.omit()

ggplot(dados.cont.usos, aes(x = sgPartido, y = log(count), color = 'BLUE')) + geom_count() + coord_flip() + labs(y = 'Usos do CEAP')
```
